data.name: Vision
data.value: Vision of the Conference

data.name: parag1
data.value:
To highlight the present capabilities of the cultural and creative economy, and explore promising opportunities for achieving sustainable development.
Mission of the Conference To stimulate the cultural and creative economy, provide a platform for showcasing outstanding scientific research, and enhance dialogue between experts, researchers, and decision-makers while offering practical recommendations to reach new horizons.

data.value: The Fourth Conference of The Administrative Sciences at Universities of The GCC Countries

data.name: ConferenceTitle
data.value:
Cultural & Creative Economy
Present Potentials & Promising Opportunities

21 – 22 April 2025 I King Saudi University Riyadh, Hamad Aljassir Hall Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

data.name: ConferenceVision
data.value: Vision of The Conference

data.name: ConferenceVisionContent
data.value: To highlight the present capabilities of the cultural and creative economy, and explore promising opportunities for achieving sustainable development.

data.name: ConferenceMission
data.value: Mission of The Conference

data.name: ConferenceMissionContent
data.value: To Stimulate The Cultural and Creative Economy, Provide a Platform For Showcasing Outstanding Dcientific Research, and Enhance Dialogue Between Experts, Researchers, and Decision-Makers While offering Practical Recommendations To Reach New Horizons.

data.name: ConferenceObjectives
data.value: Objectives of The Conference

data.name: ConferenceObjectivesContent
data.value:
1- Highlight the role of creativity and innovation in enhancing sustainable development and improving communities.
2- Stimulate the ability of individuals and communities to adapt to rapid changes through the exchange of innovative ideas.
3- Promote dialogue and collaboration between experts and decision-makers to provide practical recommendations that address current issues.
4- Encourage participants to discover their creative potential and make better use of their intellectual energies.

data.name: CCC_CBA
data.value: CCC_CBA 2025

data.name: CCC_CBA_Content
data.value:
• 2 days of scientific studies
• 200 economic and cultural research papers
• Over 7,000 attendees
• Partners from around the world
• 10-panel discussions
• 50 local, Gulf, Arab, and global speakers

data.name: AboutUs
data.value: About Us

data.name: AboutUsContent
data.value: The Fourth Conference of Administrative Sciences Colleges in the Universities of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) is a leading scientific platform under the theme “Cultural and Creative Economy: Present Potential and Promising Opportunities.” The conference aims to explore the role of the cultural and creative economy in driving growth and sustainable development, while highlighting the promising opportunities offered by this vital sector. By bringing together academics, experts, and practitioners, the conference seeks to open new horizons for cooperation and knowledge exchange among the GCC countries, while also supporting innovation in the creative economy. Additionally, the conference welcomes participation from countries outside the GCC, providing a global platform for new opportunities in the creative sector.

data.name: SecondAnnouncementContent
data.value:
🌟 In collaboration with EmeraldGlobal
📅 Date: Wednesday, January 29, 2025
⏰ Time: 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM (Riyadh Time)
📚 Join us for an exclusive training session on maximizing your research potential with Emerald Databases, as part of the 4th Conference of Administrative Sciences Colleges of GCC Universities under the theme:
"Cultural and Creative Economy: Present Opportunities and Promising Prospects"

Trial Access Details:
• Products: EPREM, BMECS, SSCS
• Start Date: Today
• Duration: Ends February 26, 2025
Important: Conference participants must create an account/profile and link it with the OAN (156813495437668). For guidance on registering a profile with an OAN, please refer to the following link: Registeration Guidance

data.name: FirstAnnouncementContent
data.value:
In collaboration with Emerald Global, as part of the 4th Conference of Administrative Sciences Colleges in GCC Universities, bringing creativity and culture together under the theme: "Cultural and Creative Economy: Present Potentials and Promising Opportunities"
We invite you to attend two exceptional workshops: "Mastering the Path to Successful Academic Publishing"
🔍 Do you want to amplify your research visibility globally?
📈 Are you looking to select the right journal and increase your citations?
🛡️ Do you need strategies to avoid predatory journals and ensure research integrity?
✨ These workshops are designed just for you!

🚀 First Session
🗓️ Date: January 27th, 7:00 PM Riyadh Time
Registration

Second Session
Date: February 17th, 7:00 PM Riyadh Time
Registration

💡 What Will You Learn?
• The true value of publishing your research and how to achieve success
• Effective strategies to boost your research impact globally
• Techniques to choose the right journal and improve acceptance rates
• Methods to protect your research from predatory publications

🎯 Who Should Attend?
• Novice researchers
• Experienced academics
• PhD candidates
• Research professionals

🔔 Additional Benefits:
• Participation certificates for attendees
• Practical tools and techniques to elevate your academic journey

📩 Register now and take your research to new heights of success!
